cab.content: THE ORGANISATION OF-THE MEDICAL PROFESSION FOR '.VAR AND CIVILIAN SERVICES.NINTH REPORT OF THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OP NATIONAL SERVICE.Note by the Secretary.It is suggested for the consideration of the War Cabinet that the above Report should be referred, in the first instance, to a Committee, which might be composed as follows:-A Member of the -Jar Cabinet as Chairman; Lord Rhondda: Sir E. Cornwall:A representative of the vi/ar Office: A representative of the Admiralty: The Secretary for Scotland,to advise and report as to the necessary legislation.(Initialled) M.P.A.H.. . *ltehall Gardens,. S..A7; , April E, 1917.
